name: Roo.bootstrap.panel.TabItem
desc: Represents an individual item (tab plus body) in a TabPanel.

config.name: listeners

methods.name: hide
methods.desc: Hides this TabPanelItem -- if you don't activate another TabPanelItem this could look odd.

methods.name: show
methods.desc: Shows this TabPanelItem -- this does not deactivate the currently active TabPanelItem.

methods.name: isHidden
methods.desc: Returns true if this tab is "hidden"

methods.name: activate
methods.desc: Activates this TabPanelItem -- this does deactivate the currently active TabPanelItem.

methods.name: isActive
methods.desc: Returns true if this tab is the active tab.

methods.name: disable
methods.desc: Disables this TabPanelItem -- this does nothing if this is the active TabPanelItem.

methods.name: setUrl
methods.desc: Set a URL to be used to load the content for this TabPanelItem.

params.name: url
params.desc: The URL to load the content from, or a function to call to get the URL

params.name: params
params.desc: (optional) The string params for the update call or an object of the params. See {@link Roo.UpdateManager#update} for more details. (Defaults to null)

params.name: loadOnce
params.desc: (optional) Whether to only load the content once. If this is false it makes the Ajax call every time this TabPanelItem is activated. (Defaults to false)

methods.name: setContent
methods.desc: Sets the content for this TabPanelItem.

params.name: content
params.desc: The content

params.name: loadScripts
params.desc: true to look for and load scripts

methods.name: getUpdateManager
methods.desc: Gets the {@link Roo.UpdateManager} for the body of this TabPanelItem. Enables you to perform Ajax updates.

methods.name: setTooltip
methods.desc: Set the tooltip for the tab.

params.name: tooltip
params.desc: The tab's tooltip

methods.name: getText
methods.desc: Returns the text for this tab

methods.name: setText
methods.desc: Sets the text for the tab (Note: this also sets the tooltip text)

params.name: text
params.desc: The tab's text and tooltip

methods.name: setHidden
methods.desc: Show or hide the tab

params.name: hidden
params.desc: True to hide or false to show.

methods.name: refresh
methods.desc:
Forces a content refresh from the URL specified in the {@link #setUrl} method.
  Will fail silently if the setUrl method has not been called.
  This does not activate the panel, just updates its content.

methods.name: enable
methods.desc: Enables this TabPanelItem if it was previously disabled.

methods.name: purgeListeners
methods.desc: Removes all listeners for this object

methods.name: on
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this element (shorthand for addListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options
params.desc: (optional)

methods.name: un
methods.desc: Removes a listener (shorthand for removeListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The handler to remove

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: addEvents
methods.desc: Used to define events on this Observable

params.name: object
params.desc: The object with the events defined

methods.name: releaseCapture
methods.desc: Removes all added captures from the Observable.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Observable to release

methods.name: removeListener
methods.desc: Removes a listener

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The handler to remove

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: fireEvent
methods.desc: Fires the specified event with the passed parameters (minus the event name).

params.name: args
params.desc: Variable number of parameters are passed to handlers

methods.name: hasListener
methods.desc: Checks to see if this object has any listeners for a specified event

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The name of the event to check for

methods.name: capture
methods.desc: Starts capture on the specified Observable. All events will be passed to the supplied function with the event name + standard signature of the event before the event is fired. If the supplied function returns false, the event will not fire.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Observable to capture

params.name: fn
params.desc: The function to call

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the fn

methods.name: addListener
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this component

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options

events.name: *close
events.desc: Fires when this tab is closed.

events.name: *activate
events.desc: Fires when this tab becomes the active tab.

params.name: tabPanel
params.desc: The parent TabPanel

events.name: *beforeclose
events.desc: Fires before this tab is closed. To cancel the close, set cancel to true on e (e.cancel = true).

params.name: e
params.desc: Set cancel to true on this object to cancel the close.

events.name: *deactivate
events.desc: Fires when this tab is no longer the active tab.

params.name: tabPanel
params.desc: The parent TabPanel
